abstract: Under a partnership unveiled this week, Fiat Chrysler will make about 100 modified Pacificas that Google will outfit with sensors and computers it has developed.
snippet: Under a partnership unveiled this week, Fiat Chrysler will make about 100 modified Pacificas that Google will outfit with sensors and computers it has developed.
lead_paragraph: WINDSOR, Ontario — In the last year, Sergio Marchionne took a few test rides in Google’s self-driving car, and he came away impressed with the speed. But it is the breathtaking pace at which the technology is advancing, not how fast the car travels, that has really grabbed his attention.

headline.main: Head of Fiat Chrysler Sees Self-Driving Cars in Five Years, Not 20
headline.print_headline: Head of Fiat Chrysler Sees Self-Driving Cars in Five Years, Not 20

byline.original: By Neal E. Boudette and Mike Isaac
